vulnerabilities.title: Improper Platform Usage
vulnerabilities.description: The app uses insecure file permissions, allowing other apps to read sensitive data.
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Store sensitive data in internal storage with restricted permissions.

vulnerabilities.title: Insecure Data Storage
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Encrypt data using Android Keystore or EncryptedSharedPreferences.

vulnerabilities.title: Insecure Communication
vulnerabilities.description: The app sends login requests over HTTP instead of HTTPS.
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Use HTTPS with TLS and enable certificate pinning.

vulnerabilities.title: Insufficient Cryptography
vulnerabilities.description: App uses MD5 for hashing sensitive values.
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Use stronger algorithms like SHA-256 or HMAC with secret keys.
